drinks.name: Tropical Paradise
drinks.description: A delightful blend of exotic fruits for a taste of paradise.

drinks.name: Berry Bliss
drinks.description: A burst of mixed berries that will make your taste buds dance.

drinks.name: Mango Tango
drinks.description: Savor the sweetness of ripe mangoes in every sip.

drinks.name: Watermelon Wave
drinks.description: A wave of juicy watermelon flavor to quench your thirst.

drinks.name: Dragon Berry Delight
drinks.description: Indulge in the vibrant flavors of dragon fruit and a mix of succulent berries.

drinks.name: Berry Apple Bliss
drinks.description: A delicious and refreshing mix of strawberries, berries, and crisp apples.

drinks.name: Mango Citrus Zest
drinks.description: Savor the tropical sweetness of ripe mangoes blended with zesty citrus fruits.

drinks.name: Tropical Fresh
drinks.description: Savor the exotic fusion of ripe papaya, watermelon, and lemon.

drinks.name: Passion Orange Mint Cooler
drinks.description: A refreshing blend of tangy passion fruit, sweet oranges, and a hint of fresh mint for a revitalizing experience.

drinks.name: Kiwi Mint Fusion Smoothie
drinks.description: A revitalizing smoothie featuring the zesty flavor of kiwi blended with the refreshing coolness of mint for a perfect balance of sweet and tangy.
